metadata.description:
Based on the original GusColors painting “Hulk & André” – take in the first moments of the final and unforgettable wrestling match between two legends of Wrestlemania: Hulk Hogan and André the Giant. Their tears symbolize the sacrifice made and all the emotions they went through in order to reach that milestone in their careers. 

Crying is the only expression that can describe 3 emotions to the fullest: pain, anger and happiness. 

#itsgoodtocry
metadata.title: Hulk Hogan and André the Giant
metadata.subtitle: A Legendary Match
metadata.name: Hulk Hogan and André the Giant
